entry.title: HUMANOMICS SDN. BHD. Vacancies Product Brand Ambassador - Sales Executive | SPM | Fresh Graduate

link.title: HUMANOMICS SDN. BHD. Vacancies Product Brand Ambassador - Sales Executive | SPM | Fresh Graduate

entry.content:
HUMANOMICS SDN. BHD. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Product Brand Ambassador - Sales Executive | SPM | Fresh Graduate position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Telco Roving Team Supervisor
  • Basic Salary + Monthly Incentive + Claim Reimbursement
  • EPF + Socso + EIS
  • Responsibilities: 
    - Recruiting the promoter, provide training, supervise, and monitoring promoter daily attendance and sales target.
    - Handling client regional PIC, preparing, and updating weekly sales reports.
Telco Contract Ambassador/ Promoter
  • Basic Salary + Attractive Incentive
  • EPF + Socso + EIS
  • Responsibilities:
    - Meeting and deployment of POSM.
    - Hit Monthly Sales Target.
    - Distribute & promote the product to the customers as Outdoor Roving Team staff.
    - Have a Dual Sim Card or Android Phone.
Product Brand Ambassador
  • Basic Salary + EPF + SOCSO & EIS
  • plus (+) Commission (can earn more than 10k)
  • Responsibilities:
    - Merchant acquisition for a few client products.
    - Telesales & make an appointment to meet merchants.
    - Visit outlet by outlet to promote the products.
Job Requirement:
  • Target oriented, able to meet sales target on a daily, weekly, monthly basis.
  • Attendance & Reporting must be punctual (compulsory)
  • Good interpersonal skills and communication.
  • Excellent customer service with a pleasant and friendly personality.
  • Committed and disciplined team player.
  • Minimum SPM (Age 18 - 35 yrs and below).
  • All Malaysian citizens.
  • Must own transportation B2/D/DA.
Location Needed: Nationwide (KL, Selangor, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan, Johor, Pahang, Terengganu, Kelantan, Penang, Kedah, Perak, Sabah & Sarawak)
Basic Requirement:
  • Candidate must possess at least Primary/Secondary School/SPM/"O" Level, Higher Secondary/STPM/"A" Level/Pre-U, Diploma/Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma in any field.
  • Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English, Mandarin, Tamil
  • At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position or no experience also can.
  • Preferably Entry Level specialized in Sales - Retail/General or equivalent.

Company Overview

ABOUT US
Humanomics was incorporated in 2015 with the aim to help clients to experience quick ROI. We are young and we are hungry, no job is too small for us.
OUR WORK
We are actively involved in promoter management and retail solutios, especially for the sales & marketing for the smartphones and IT industries.
Our people are properly trained to aggressively sell in the marketplace. Generating ROI is our only priority.
OUR SERVICES
Let us lessen your go-to-market burden. At Humanomics, we provide sales & marketing support for your business. Let us do the hard-work for you:-
  • FIELD FORCE MANAGEMENT
    • We manage the field force personnel for your company, from recruitment, training, execution, monitoring, and payroll, everything will be take care by us.
  • PROMOTERS MANAGEMENT
    • We train & provide promoters throughout the country to help you sell your products
  • EVENT MANAGEMENT
    • Trade events, fairs, roadshows, in-store promotions, we cover it all!
  • MERCHANT ACQUISITION
    • We help client (i.e. Fintech company) to acquire merchant
  • PREMIUM SOURCING
    • If you ever need gifts & promoters uniforms to be produced, give us a call
  • SALES SUPPORT
    • We can help you manage merchandisers, field force teams, incentive programs and much more
  • MOBILE TRUCK / ROVING TEAM
    • Itching to reach tier 2 & 3 towns in Malaysia but don’t know how? Engage our roving team
  • CUSTOMER CARE SERVICE
    • Thinking about outsource your customer care service centre? We can manage it for you.

OUR CLIENTS (BRANDS)
  • Microsoft
  • Nokia
  • Grab
  • Maxis 
  • Digi
  • Roca
  • Johnson Suisse
  • Axiata group
  • LG 
  • Jabra
  • Chewies
  • Gates
  • Penta Sure
  • Citra
  • Lakmé Cosmetics
  • Rimmel
  • Dutch Lady
  • Spritzer
  • Oldtown White Coffee
  • Heineken
  • Health Land SPA
  • Carousell
  • Friso
  • CIMB Bank
  • Maybank
  • Neffos Mobile
  • Fitbit
  • Wiko
  • Lego
  • Obike
  • NailPop
It’s our honour to be managing these brands. Nothing is more satisfying than watching these brands grow. Knowing that we have contributed to its growth in the marketplace makes it a little sweeter.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor, Kedah, Kelantan, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan, Penang, Pahang, Perak, Sabah, Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: HUMANOMICS SDN. BHD. is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Product Brand Ambassador - Sales Executive | SPM | Fresh Graduate which positioned at Johor, Kedah, Kelantan, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan, Penang, Pahang, Perak, Sabah, Selangor

entry.title: CTOS Data Systems Sdn Bhd Vacancies Sales & Business Development Officer (Johor Bharu )

link.title: CTOS Data Systems Sdn Bhd Vacancies Sales & Business Development Officer (Johor Bharu )

entry.content:
CTOS Data Systems Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Sales & Business Development Officer (Johor Bharu ) position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

  • The BDO role offers an exciting opportunity to promote the use of CTOS’s proprietary risk management solutions amongst business users.
  • The role focuses on customer acquisition and exposes you to business owners and entrepreneurs across a wide range of industry sectors. Ample training and guidance will be given to hone your client engagement and selling skills.

Job Requirements:
  • Malaysians or individuals with relevant residence status.
  • Candidates with 1 year of sales experience preferred – SME sales experience will be an added advantage.
  • Fresh graduates with diploma / degrees are also encouraged to apply.
  • Highly self-motivated, Strong interpersonal and Communication skills.
  • Results oriented, self-driven, persuasive, persistent and resourceful.
  • Able to work in a team as well as independently.
  • Fluency in written and spoken English,  Mandarin and Bahasa Malaysia.
  • Possess own transport.
  • This position is required to Travel and perform Outdoor Sales.

Remunerations:
  • Base salary of RM 2,000
  • Car and travel allowance of RM 1000 (refer to sales scheme)
  • Highly attractive sales commissions (up to RM10,000 per month possible)
  • Good benefits & medical coverage
Work Location:
We are hiring for our branch offices in:
  • Southern: Johor Bahru / Batu Pahat / Muar / 
Please state your preference working location in your application.

Company Overview

Company Overview

We are Malaysia’s leading Credit Reporting Agency (CRA) and we are aggressively expanding our business, and looking for dynamic, driven and motivated individuals to join our team. Our Direct-To-Consumer segment (D2C), is one of our fastest growing product areas in the market, with an abundance of expansion plans and innovative ideas on hand.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online

entry.title: Company Confidential Vacancies Sales & Marketing Executive

link.title: Company Confidential Vacancies Sales & Marketing Executive

entry.content:
Company Confidential is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Sales & Marketing Executive position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Position Summary
The position focuses on driving student recruitment to the school through various sales channels and marketing events. This position works towards set KPI and targets and works closely with the Principal, Marketing and Admission teams.
Job Responsibilities
  1. Initiate, execute and review sales and marketing activities and plans to drive student recruitment.
  2. To meet sales targets and KPI set by management.
  3. To generate sales and marketing reports.
  4. To lead enquiry management and timely follow-ups with potential leads to convert them into registered students.
  5. Forge good relationships with parents, students, local council and Ministry of Education.
  6. To conduct market intelligence and generate reports.
  7. To identify market potential and market development activities.
  8. To conduct surveys and customer satisfaction reviews.
  9. To provide feedback to the management on market sentiments and customer reviews.
Candidate Requirement
  1. A Bachelor’s degree holder in any field.
  2. Work experience in the education industry is preferable. 
  3. An aggressive go-getter with a keen focus on KPI and targets.
  4. Independent, hands-on and an on-ground type of person.
  5. Pleasant personality, good communicator with great customer service skills.
  6. Able to communicate in English, Mandarin and Bahasa Malaysia fluently (written and spoken).
  7. Must be able to travel and possesses own transport.
  8. Able to work on weekends and long hours occasionally.

Company Overview

Our group of international schools are dedicated to provide exceptional education to students worldwide.
We offer the Cambridge international curriculum and Fieldwork Education’s thematic learning (IEYC, IPC and IMYC). In addition, our bilingual education system to produce students who are fluent in both English and Mandarin - and have excellent HSK results to show.
We equip our students with state-of-the-art facilities for all manners of learning especially coding, AI and robotics syllabus. We also have the JASS and Duke of Edinburgh Award programme in place to ensure students develop their interests as they grow to become valuable members of society.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Company Confidential is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Sales & Marketing Executive which positioned at Johor

entry.title: Linocraft Printers Sdn Bhd Vacancies Security Guard / Pengawal Keselamatan

link.title: Linocraft Printers Sdn Bhd Vacancies Security Guard / Pengawal Keselamatan

entry.content:
Linocraft Printers Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Security Guard / Pengawal Keselamatan position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

• FAEDAH PERUBATAN / MEDICAL BENEFITS
• CUTI TAHUNAN / ANNUAL LEAVE
• CUTI AWAM / PUBLIC HOLIDAY
• KWSP & SOCSO / EPF & SOCSO
• KERJA LEBIH MASA / OVERTIME
Tanggungjawab :
  • Membuat rondaan / pemeriksaan
  • Memberikan perkhidmatan kawalan dan keselamatan kepada syarikat termasuk membuat rondaan keseluruh kawasan kilang setiap hari
  • Mengawal dan memeriksa kemasukan pelawat ke dalam syarikat
  • Memerhati dan peka terhadap aktiviti yang mencurigakan.
  • Tugas tambahan yang diberikan oleh pihak atasan atau pihak pengurusan dari masa ke semasa.
Syarat Kelayakan:
  • Calon sekurang-kurangya mempunyai sijil SPM dan ke atas.
  • Sekurang-kurangnya 2 tahun pengalaman dalam bidang berkaitan.
  • Boleh bekerja shift dan cuti umum.
  • Berdisplin dan tidak mempunyai rekod jenayah
  • Mempunyai pengangkutan sendiri dan lesen memandu kereta (D).
Responsibilities :
  • Security rounding / checking
  • Provides security and safety service for the company which including daily patrol for whole factory
  • Protect and safeguard all assets belonging to the company
  • Prevent entry of unauthorized personal
  • Monitor and alert to any suspicious activities.
  • Any ad-hoc tasks which assigned by superior or management from time to time.
Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least SPM or above
  • At least 2 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Willingly to work on shift and during public holiday
  • Highly disciplined and no previous police record
  • Possess own transport and driving license (Class D).

Company Overview

Today, Linocraft Printers are at the forefront of the local printing industry. In bookbinding alone, we are one of only a few companies who are capable of high capacity. The printing jobs we handle for our clients ranging from instruction manuals for electronic products, canned food labels, books and annual reports, to marketing materials such as leaflets and brochures. In line with our expansion plan, Linocraft Printers has now diversified into offset printed packaging boxes and cartons.
History
First established in 1972, Linocraft Printers began business by providing letterpress-printing services for bills and business forms. The company moved aggressively into offset printing since 1981 when company management reformed, focusing initially on printing labels for canneries within the southern region of Peninsula Malaysia.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Shipping Assistant
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Shipping Assistant position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Chen Feng Enterprise Sdn Bhd
Responsibilities
  • To liaise with multiple liners and 3rd party forwarder for bookings/shipment arrangement.
  • To work with forwarder and 3rd party warehouse on routing to ensure smooth operations.
  • To arrange and compile cargo loading pictures required documents submissions.
  • Assist in application of export or import document from government agencies or established bodies such as MITI, the Chamber of Commerce, MTIB and etc.
  • To assist in preparing LOA, LOI, loading list and filing shipment documents.
  • To help in updating Shipment Notice Board.
  • Perform and maintain 5S at company facility.
  • Any ad hoc task assigned by superior
Qualification
  • Diploma/STPM/SPM
  • Microsoft Office
  • Ability to speak English and Bahasa Malaysia. Mandarin will be advantage.
Experience
  • Shipping/Logistic
Benefits
  • We are growing company
  • Teamwork oriented
  • Free company trip
  • Company training.
  • Medical benefits.
  • Uniform provided
  • Annual Leave
  • Sick Leave

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

entry.title: Taiko Acid Works Sdn Bhd Vacancies Boilerman

link.title: Taiko Acid Works Sdn Bhd Vacancies Boilerman

entry.content:
Taiko Acid Works Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Boilerman position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Responsibilities: 
  • To ensure the operation of boilers meets the relevant Statutory requirement; prepare and assist for JKKP boiler annual inspection.
  • To ensure the safety of boiler system operation and cleanliness of environment.
  • To control water supply quality and level to the boiler by monitoring RO plant and utilizing the DCS system.
  • To undertake preventive maintenance of boilers/turbine system and RO plant to minimize breakdowns and/or avoid disruption to the production process/customer delivery schedules.
  • To maintain the relevant records for boiler operation and repair.
  • To ensure sufficient steam distribution for the plant process and ensure the RO plant process running in smooth operation.
  • To record daily boiler operation data in logbook and report for any abnormality.
  • To prepare and assist in JKKP annual boiler inspection.
  • To ensure proper handover procedure when changing shift.
  • To assist in troubleshooting of process and equipment failure on steam generation system and turbine system.
  • To assist in overhaul of boilers and associated equipment.
  • To undertake any other tasks as directed by the Superior/Management as and when required.
Job Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least an SPM/STPM or equivalent.
  • Minimum of 2-3 years’ working experience in boiler operation and in a manufacturing environment.
  • Possess Boilerman Certificate Grade 1 or 2 certified by DOSH/JKKP.
  • Preferably with experience in waste heat boiler, steam turbine operation and boiler water treatment system (such as DM or RO plant).
  • Experienced in Chemical Plant and knowledge in boiler control system using DCS is an added advantage.
  • Willing to work on shift and Public Holidays.

For more information on our Group of Companies, please visit us at www.taikogroup.net
All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality. Only short-listed candidates will be notified.

Company Overview

The Taiko Group is one of Malaysia's most dynamic and versatile privately held business groups. The Group's headquarters is based in Ipoh, Perak, malaysia with operations spread throughout Asia and Europe. The Taiko name is synonymous with dynamic and sustainable growth, sound financial fundamentals, professional management and a strong commitment to quality and excellence.

Our Clay Business Group is the world’s fastest growing bleaching clay / activated clay producer. Taiko bleaching earth business started at the time when Malaysian palm oil production was around 5 million metric tons per year. Today, we have 6 manufacturing plants in Asia Pacific with capacity of 500,000 metric tons per year.

Our Group's core product is Bleaching Earth, a highly effective adsorbent essential in the refining process for the purification and decolourisation of edible and non-edible oils, fats, tallow, petroleum jelly, paraffin oil and waxes. Today, Taiko Bleaching Earth are used in over 50 countries for the refining of all major vegetable oils and animal fats.

Sulphuric Acid manufacturing is one of the other businesses in our Bleaching Earth Busines group. With the new plant in Pasir Gudang, Johor, our Group now has 2 Sulphuric Acid plants in Malaysia.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Taiko Acid Works Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Boilerman which positioned at Johor

entry.title: Startek Vacancies Customer Care Executive (Transportation Industry) JOHOR

link.title: Startek Vacancies Customer Care Executive (Transportation Industry) JOHOR

entry.content:
Startek is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Customer Care Executive (Transportation Industry) JOHOR position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Startek is a leading global provider in outsourcing solution are currently looking for dedicated and talented Customer Service Executive.
How this career will benefit you?
  • Various Allowances
  • Attractive Incentives
  • Annual Leave
  • Sick Leave
  • Full Training Provided
  • Subsidized accommodation (if needed)
  • Shuttle service provided based on specific location. (JB Area)
To be successful in this role, you will need to have
  • Able to work on Rotating Shift (24/7)
  • Excellent and fluent in Bahasa and English languages
  • Must be energetic, positive minded and good team player
  • Applicants must be Malaysian citizen
  • At least SPM graduate who are interested to start their career in a call center are also encouraged   to   apply
You will play an important role in:
  • Handling all outbound calls
  • To exceed customers expectation in terms of customer service & accurate information
  • Work in a team to achieve the required KPI elements and SLA
Career Prospect:
  • Internal Job Posting: opportunity to apply to transfer within Startek Malaysia or to other Startek locations worldwide at the discreation on Management.
  • Startek hires from across the globe so there is an opportunity to interact with people from different cultures and ethnicity (Europe, Asia Pacific, etc)
Career Growth & Training Programs:
  • Career Path: Executive > Senior Executive > Specialist > Team Leader > Assistant Manager > Manager
  • iSTAR – System for Appraisal & Rewards – The STAR training is to help Startek employees to identify their weakness and to develop future leaders for the company.
  • English Training – Startek provides English training for Startek employees who would like to improve their communication & business writing skills.
Call for Action!
Are you ready to make that career shift? Trust us, this role is always on-demand and you will grow a great portfolio with us. This opportunity does not come often. Click that ‘Apply Now’ button and we will talk to you soon.

Company Overview

About STARTEK
Startek is a leading global provider of technology-enabled business process outsourcing solutions. The company provides omni-channel customer experience management, back office and technology services to corporations around the world across a range of industries. The company has more than 45,000 outsourcing experts across 54 delivery campuses worldwide that are committed to delivering transformative customer experiences for clients. Services include omni-channel customer care, customer acquisition, order processing, technical support, receivables management and analytics through automation, voice, chat, email, social media and IVR, resulting in superior business results for its clients. To learn more about Startek’s global solutions, please visit www.startek.com.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Startek is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Customer Care Executive (Transportation Industry) JOHOR which positioned at Johor
